alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 3:25PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Jackson and Trempealeau Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 324 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Whitehall to Fountain City. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arcadia, Whitehall, Galesville, Blair, Independence, North Bend, Franklin, York, Northfield, Merrillan, Ettrick, Alma Center, Taylor, Hixton, Pigeon Falls, Beach Corners, North Branch, Tamarack, Pleasantville and Hegg. People attending Soldiers Walk Memorial Park should seek safe shelter immediately! This includes Interstate 94 between mile markers 97 and 111. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
